item.description:
Come join us after a long week of work for Happy Hour, and Blanket Workshop.

After enjoying some beverages and eats, we'll work on creating a warm and cozy fleece blanket. No sewing or talent necessary, it's very simple. You'll being going home with an easy to wash blanket that will last forever.


Don't need a blanket for yourself?
How about a gift or for a pet bed.

Â 

Come have some fun and be creative! Here are a list of supplies you'll need:

  • 2 yards of fleece fabric - 1 yard solid (back), 1 yard print (front)
  • Scissors
  • Measuring tape or ruler
  • 1 - 5x7 piece of card board
  • Pins
  • Optional: 4 Cloths pins

Please bring small appetizer to share and BYOB. Carpooling highly encourage as parking is limited.
item.name: Blanket Workshop & Happy Hour
